full.name: Voxtral Mini 3B (Full)
full.description: Full precision model - Best quality, requires ~20-30GB RAM during loading (CPU loading: 10-30 min)

memory_requirements.load_time_cpu: 10-30 minutes (use NVIDIA GPU for faster loading)

quantized.name: Voxtral Mini 3B (4-bit Quantized)
quantized.description: 4-bit quantized model - 75% less memory usage (NVIDIA GPU required, auto-falls back to full precision on Mac/CPU)

small-24b.name: Voxtral Small 24B (Full)
small-24b.description: Large 24B model - Best quality and accuracy, requires high-end GPU with ~55GB VRAM or significant RAM

memory_requirements.load_time_cpu: Not recommended - use GPU with 55+ GB VRAM

small-24b-quantized.name: Voxtral Small 24B (4-bit Quantized)
small-24b-quantized.description: 4-bit quantized 24B model - High quality with reduced memory, requires NVIDIA GPU with ~16GB VRAM

memory_requirements.load_time_cpu: Not supported - requires NVIDIA GPU with CUDA

mlx-mini-3b-4bit.name: Voxtral Mini 3B MLX (4-bit)
mlx-mini-3b-4bit.description: MLX-optimized 4-bit model for Apple Silicon - Fast inference on Mac M1/M2/M3/M4 (25-30x faster than PyTorch)

mlx-mini-3b-8bit.name: Voxtral Mini 3B MLX (8-bit)
mlx-mini-3b-8bit.description: MLX-optimized 8-bit model for Apple Silicon - Better quality, fast inference on Mac M1/M2/M3/M4

whisper-base-gguf.name: Whisper Base (GGUF)
whisper-base-gguf.description: Whisper Base via llama.cpp - Fast, lightweight, ~74MB model. Good for quick transcriptions.

whisper-small-gguf.name: Whisper Small (GGUF)
whisper-small-gguf.description: Whisper Small via llama.cpp - Good balance of speed and accuracy. ~244MB model.

whisper-medium-gguf.name: Whisper Medium (GGUF)
whisper-medium-gguf.description: Whisper Medium via llama.cpp - Higher accuracy, moderate resource usage. ~769MB model.

whisper-large-v3-gguf.name: Whisper Large v3 (GGUF)
whisper-large-v3-gguf.description: Whisper Large v3 via llama.cpp - Best accuracy, requires more resources. ~1.5GB model.

whisper-large-v3-turbo-gguf.name: Whisper Large v3 Turbo (GGUF)
whisper-large-v3-turbo-gguf.description: Whisper Large v3 Turbo via llama.cpp - Fast and accurate, distilled model. ~809MB.

mac-24gb.name: Voxtral Mini 3B (Mac 24GB)
mac-24gb.description: Optimized for Apple Silicon Macs with 24GB unified memory - Uses Metal Performance Shaders for fast inference

mac-64gb-large.name: Voxtral 24B (Mac Large)
mac-64gb-large.description: Large 24B model for high-end Macs - Requires 64GB+ unified memory (M2 Max/Ultra, M3 Max/Ultra)
